/* com.innobiz.orange.web.wh.dao.WhPichGrpBDao.selectWhPichGrpB */
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.PICH_GRP_ID, T.COMP_ID, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM WH_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AS PICH_GRP_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.USE_YN, T.DFT_YN, T.REGR_UID, T.REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, T.MOD_DT,
FROM WH_PICH_GRP_B T
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.REG_DT
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
